jobs.title: Developer/Website design, logo design and linecard
jobs.description: We are a new automation company and requiring the following: A complete website, logo design and line card. The website needs to be responsive and we a have list of products which needs to be searchable. The company name is K2 Automation like the mountain. We specialise in current and obsolete automation parts (hmi's, servo drives, motors, cpus etc). The message we want to communicate to our customers is that whatever part they are looking for we can source it them, no job is too difficult for us.

jobs.title: Developer needed to convert custom made website into a WordPress
jobs.description: I currently have a website custom built by a local company. My website does not complete the functionality it was designed for and due to it being custom built I have no control over the back end. I am looking for a developer to re-create the exact website I have but in WordPress and guide me through the process of it all.

jobs.title: UI designer for SaaS platform (mobile first)
jobs.description: We're looking for a talented UI designer to create some nice interactive wireframes/mockups for our platform. The main focus would be mobile-first, with a strong understanding of the customer journey.
